author: Andrew Udvare <audvare@gmail.com>
description: Save Patreon content you have access to.
name: patreon-archiver

scripts.check-formatting: prettier -c './**/*.ini' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc ./.style.yapf && poetry run isort . --check && poetry run yapf -rd patreon_archiver .stubs test
scripts.format: prettier -w './**/*.ini' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.y*ml' ./.prettierrc ./.style.yapf && poetry run isort . && poetry run yapf -ri patreon_archiver .stubs test
scripts.qa: yarn mypy && yarn pylint && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
